We love helping greenify your home

From improving your homeplant decorations to maintenance and repair-- we got your back!

Start your plants off right

Ben and Penny Hewitt, the authors of The Nourishing Homestead, have developed a three-step process which starts with the following procedures.

Inoculate

It is the process of coating the seed with the bacteria that allow it to “fix” nitrogen in the soil.

Sow your seeds

It is fine to start from scract but sowing your seeds into high quality potting soil is our main goal.

Punt the pots

One of the best investment is the soil blocker in which scompresses loose potting soil into tight seedling blocks.

A simple qoute for you

The secret of improved plant breeding, apart from scientific knowledge is love.

Luther Burbank
